name: Orbital Defense (Beer Horns Games)
description:
Shield Earth from the asteroids!

Orbital Defense is a simple action game. The Earth is being pelted with asteroids. You control the orbital defense shield which has the power to disintegrate the asteroids. Destroying asteroids earns you the chance to unlock upgrades to help your chances of saving the planet. Can you survive long enough to face off against the alien threat that started this all?
